text: The Sandman is a 2000 dance film made by the Brothers Quay and William Tuckett. A televised ballet, it stars Tamara Rojo, Irek Mukhamedov, Zenaida Yanowsky, and Heathcote Williams. It is loosely based on E. T. A. Hoffmann's story "The Sandman". ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 films Category:American films Category:Ballet films Category:Films based on works by E. T. A. Hoffmann Category:Films directed by the Brothers Quay Category:British films
title: The Sandman (2000 film)
